name: AURenderCallback
desc: Called by the system when an audio unit requires input samples, or before and after a render operation.
declaration: typealias AURenderCallback = (UnsafeMutableRawPointer, UnsafeMutablePointer<AudioUnitRenderActionFlags>, UnsafePointer<AudioTimeStamp>, UInt32, UInt32, UnsafeMutablePointer<AudioBufferList>?) -> OSStatus
